analyzed: bhante nāgasena tvam pana paṭisandahissasi iti

original: “Alaṁ, mahārāja, kiṁ te tena pucchitena, nanu mayā paṭikacceva akkhātaṁ ‘sace, mahārāja, saupādāno bhavissāmi, paṭisandahissāmi, sace anupādāno bhavissāmi, na paṭisandahissāmī’”ti.
analyzed: ala mahā rāja kim te tena pucchitena nanu mayā paṭikaccā iva akkhātam sace mahā rāja sa upādānaḥ bhavissāmi paṭisandahissāmi sace anupādānaḥ bhavissāmi na paṭisandahissāmi iti

original: “Yathā, mahārāja, kocideva puriso rañño adhikāraṁ kareyya.
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja kocid eva purisaḥ raññaḥ adhikāram kareyya

original: Rājā tuṭṭho adhikāraṁ dadeyya, so tena adhikārena pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappito samaṅgibhūto paricareyya, so ce janassa āroceyya ‘na me rājā kiñci paṭikarotī’ti.
analyzed: rājā tuṭṭhaḥ adhikāram dadeyya saḥ tena adhikārena pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappitaḥ samaṅgi bhūtaḥ paricareyya saḥ ce janassa āroceyya na me rājā kiñci paṭikaroti iti

original: Kiṁ nu kho so, mahārāja, puriso yuttakārī bhaveyyā”ti?
analyzed: kim nu kho saḥ mahā rāja purisaḥ yutta kārī bhaveyya ati

original: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, kiṁ te tena pucchitena, nanu mayā paṭikacceva akkhātaṁ ‘sace saupādāno bhavissāmi, paṭisandahissāmi, sace anupādāno bhavissāmi, na paṭisandahissāmī’”ti.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja kim te tena pucchitena nanu mayā akkhātam sace sa upādānaḥ bhavissāmi paṭisandahissāmi sace anupādānaḥ bhavissāmi na paṭisandahissāmi iti
